options.content:
### Are My Clusters in Sync?

- The `last_dr_wal` or `last_performance_wal` on the primary represents the last known WAL shipped to the secondary.
- This can be compared with `last_remote_wal` on a secondary to learn how far behind it is from the primary

panels.description: To detect back pressure from a slow storage backend, monitor the `vault.wal_flushready` and `vault.wal_persistwals` metrics.
panels.title: Back pressure from storage

panels.description: The time to retrieve a value for a path.
panels.title: Raft - Get Storage - pp

panels.description: The time to retrieve a value for a path.
panels.title: Raft - Put Storage - pp

panels.description: The time to retrieve a value for a path.
panels.title: Raft - List/Delete Storage - pp

panels.description: Duration of time taken by requests handled by Vault core
panels.title: Number of requests Handled

panels.description: These metrics represent system level CPU measurements that are provided by the node-exporter agent.
panels.title: Node CPU

panels.description: Number of service tokens available for use.
panels.title: Available Tokens

panels.description: Number of existing tokens broken down by the auth method used to create them.
panels.title: Tokens by Auth Method

panels.description: Total number of distinct entities that created a token during the current month. Only available if client count is enabled. Reported periodically within each month.
panels.title: Identity Entity Active Partial Month - pp
